front.title: TLS Fallback Signaling Cipher Suite Value (SCSV) for Preventing Protocol Downgrade Attacks

abstract.t: This document defines a Signaling Cipher Suite Value (SCSV) that prevents protocol downgrade attacks on the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocols. It updates RFC 2246, RFC 4346, RFC 4347, RFC 5246, and RFC 6347. Server update considerations are included.
